verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your love is unto me
Like an ever-flowing stream.
Your love is unto me
Like an ever-flowing stream,
Flowing out, Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, I need Your love.
Lord, I need Your love.
I need Your love to carry me through.
Lord, I need Your love.
Lord, I need Your love.
I need Your love to carry me through.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
/Su amor es para mí, un eterno manantial/(2)
Que está fluyendo
Dios te necesito, necesito de tu amor
Necesito tu amor hasta el final
